short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily share links to social media without leaving the browser tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Oktopost is the only B2B social media management and employee advocacy platform. With Oktopost, you can plan and share content at scale, form meaningful connections with your audience, and measure the impact of your social media on the business.

The Oktopost Social Sharing extension for Chrome makes it easy to share content you find while browsing the web on social media.

How it works
1. Install the extension.
2. Click it when you find an interesting link you want to share on your social media channels.

Please note that you must have an Oktopost account to use this extension.
